value:
$WmMPID_行楽フローラ,ch05_41_Flora_F_Picnic19,Face|Lord Leo! Is something wrong?
You look deathly pale. You didn't
eat Felicia's cooking, did you?$k$p$WmMPID_行楽フェリシア,ch05_15_Felicia_F_Picnic19,Face|F-Flora! I'm right here!$k$p$WmMPID_行楽レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Picnic19,Face|...Are you saying that isn't what
happened?$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ジェニー,ch10_13_Jenny_F_Picnic19,Face|Hey, so, umm... Is this where we're
supposed to fight?$k$p$WmMPID_行楽ルカ,ch10_15_Luka_M_Picnic19,Face|It seems so—though I'd rather lay out
a picnic... Alas, our contract is clear:
we must fight to reveal their power.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|So, what do you think? Picnics are
the best, aren't they?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes, it's nice to lie in the grass,
surrounded by wildflowers. You can
just let go of all your usual worries.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Agreed! Some time away from the
battlefield can be so...serene.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|That's right! Just like I said, right?
That's what picnics are all about!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|But since we spent so much time
getting out here, is there any way
we can make it more...valuable?$k$pI mean, if I could come up with a new
business strategy, that'd be like...two
Fehs with one Orb! ...Er, hang on...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I know what you mean, Anna. I'd love
it if I could get studying done while
we're out he—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|NO! That's not how you picnic!
Picnics are supposed to be spent
relaxing!$k$p...Is that CLEAR?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Yes, Princess Sharena.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Perfectly clear, Sharena. So, then...
how do suppose we should best
spend our time picnicing?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Hm... Good question! How about...
we all have some tea, and then make
flower crowns for each other!$k$pDon't worry if you don't know how...
I'll show you! And that goes for you
too, $Nu!$k$p$Sbs150|
